resources.string: You answered %1$d of 4 questions correctly. Your Score is %2$d%%. You may click the button to Try Again.
You missed 3 questions and scored 25%, which means you probably can\'t help Kenny with his homework! Do you know anyone in the 6th grade who can help?
Congratulations! You scored 100! You are 100% qualified to assist Kenny with his homework!
This is awkward, but you scored 0%. You are not qualified to help Kenny with his homework! Perhaps you should hire a tutor for both of you?
You got half of the questions wrong. Unfortunately, you won\'t be much help to Kenny. Is there a tutor you can call?
You missed one question, and your score is 75%. You can help Kenny with his homework, but you should double check your work before turning it in.
Markie can jog 4 miles in one hour. How long does it take Markie to jog 18 miles?
Which of the following metals have assisted in the advancement of humankind? Check all that apply.
Which of the shapes below is a hexagon? Click on the correct shape to proceed to the next question.
How old must a person be to become a United States Senator? Type your answer in the field below, then press the Submit button to calculate your score.
